q1.question: How do I gain experience points?
q1.answer:
Experience is based on online time.
After logging in, each hour online grants 1 point, up to 24 per day.
Partial hours accumulate to the next calculation.
The system updates daily at 8:00 AM.
If an unexpected issue prevents the update, points will be added on the next day.

q2.question: Can't hear others / others can't hear me?
q2.answer:
If you can't hear others, check:

◎ Ensure the headset is connected and working (use RiceCall's test).
  Path: RC Voice → Settings → Audio → Device Settings

◎ Verify device selection:
  ◆ Can't hear: adjust output device in the same page
  ◆ Others can't hear you: adjust input device in the same page

q3.question: Is this the original RC Voice official?
q3.answer: No. We are an independent team with no affiliation to the original.

q7.question: What if it keeps loading after login?
q7.answer: Log out and log in again. If frequent, report in Discord 'Issues'.

q8.question: Error popups?
q8.answer: Screenshot and describe steps to reproduce in Discord 'Issues'.

q9.question: Can't log in?
q9.answer: Ensure you have the latest version. If it persists, report in Discord.
